posts.title: 旧文整理
posts.text:
过去写过的几篇博文…… 格式懒得搞了 就这样吧 AIpoemPosted on 2020-05-17几首诗这几首诗是人工智能九歌写的害身死死无拘束怕听啼乌血未乾极望平生悲愤意了馀愁絶鬓丝寒 一行七人来抬棺墓中双泪不曾干君王莫问三生事留取高风万古看 抑扬同慷慨郁气入平生而子今何在终年礼乐成 (￣ ‘i ￣;) I WILL D Posted on 2020-05-17数一下我在用hexo搭建博客时犯了多少错1windows账户名为中文 这时 1npm install hexo-cli -g死活输不进去 没事，我之前为了玩游戏搞了个英文账户 21$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C “邮箱地址”弄不了，最后是看了这个 先把用户名和邮箱设置了才行具体方式：12git config –global user.name “username”git config –global user.email “xxx@qq.com“3在用1C: log\spl>hexo g时出错 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374C: log\spl>hexo gINFO Start processingERROR Process failed: _posts/hello-world.mdTypeError [ERR_INVALID_URL]: Invalid URL: http://https:superloli233.github.io at onParseError (internal/url.js:257:9) at new URL (internal/url.js:333:5) at new URL (internal/url.js:330:22) at C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo-util\lib ull_url_for.js:22:18 at Cache.apply (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo-util\lib\cache.js:27:46) at Hexo.fullUrlForHelper (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo-util\lib ull_url_for.js:18:16) at Hexo.module.exports (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo\lib\plugins\helper ull_url_for.js:5:23) at _Document.<anonymous> (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo\lib\models\post.js:54:25) at _Document.permalink (C: log\spl
ode_modules\warehouse\lib	ypes\virtual.js:59:24) at _Document.toObject (C: log\spl
ode_modules\warehouse\lib\document.js:73:44) at _Model._replaceById (C: log\spl
ode_modules\warehouse\lib\model.js:308:25) at C: log\spl
ode_modules\warehouse\lib\model.js:330:63 at tryCatcher (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\util.js:16:23) at C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\using.js:185:26 at tryCatcher (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\util.js:16:23) at Promise._settlePromiseFromHandler (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:547:31) at Promise._settlePromise (C: log\spl

ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise_array.js:145:14)FATAL Something's wrong. Maybe you can find the solution here: https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.htmlTypeError [ERR_INVALID_URL]: Invalid URL: http://https:superloli233.github.io at onParseError (internal/url.js:257:9) at new URL (internal/url.js:333:5) at new URL (internal/url.js:330:22) at C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo-util\lib ull_url_for.js:22:18 at Cache.apply (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo-util\lib\cache.js:27:46) at Object.fullUrlForHelper (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo-util\lib ull_url_for.js:18:16) at Object.module.exports (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo\lib\plugins\helper ull_url_for.js:5:23) at new Locals (C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo\lib\hexo\index.js:366:33) at C: log\spl
ode_modules\hexo\lib\hexo\index.js:417:49 at tryCatcher (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\util.js:16:23) at MappingPromiseArray._promiseFulfilled (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\map.js:68:38) at MappingPromiseArray.PromiseArray._iterate (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise_array.js:115:31) at MappingPromiseArray.init (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise_array.js:79:10) at Promise._settlePromise (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:601:21) at Promise._settlePromise0 (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:649:10) at Promise._settlePromises (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:729:18) at Promise._fulfill (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:673:18) at Promise._resolveCallback (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:466:57) at ReductionPromiseArray._resolve (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jseleaseeduce.js:60:19) at Promise.completed [as _fulfillmentHandler0] (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jseleaseeduce.js:133:15) at Promise._settlePromise (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:601:21) at Promise._settlePromise0 (C: log\spl
ode_modules luebird\jselease\promise.js:649:10)哦呵呵呵呵草一下给我报两个错不死心，再ctrl+v一遍结果就剩下后面那个错了，前面那个错（似乎是md文件格式有误）消失不见了第二个错的解决办法:-config.yml文件里最后几行有个1## Docs: 这里应该加SSH而不是https4输hexo XXXXX不管在用cmd还是GitBash都没有反应1bash: hexo: command not foundmd F**K 这又是咋回事******经过一段时间之后，我能肯定就是环境变量没设好设环境变量还可以，至少对我这个电子文盲来说是这样的问题是路径在哪？？？？？？？经过一番艰难的百度后我找到了这个启发了我这个cmd后缀的文件或许就在那个位置顺利的在C:\Users\oneday\AppData\Roaming
pm找到了hexo.cmd后记其实应该还碰到了别的麻烦，但我已经想不起来了。那些麻烦太糟心了。 这段时间的整理Posted on 2020-05-25说真的，我不知道自己要做什么那么，我就整理一下我的收藏夹，顺便做个导航？？？然而我并不会做网页但我会去做的不过可能要等一两年没关系没关系说白了就是我想告诉别人我是怎么找资源的虽然我并不擅长这个再一个，我想搜集一下过去的故事，尤其是翻车的故事没有人整理这些的话就太遗憾了 …………………… 1 ![]() [img]https://ftp.bmp.ovh/imgs/2021/04/a75f9b3cf4a667f2.jpg 默认preview是伊朗33孔桥

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
